['Now toggles between the Morphed form and Morphling, instead of ending Morph prematurely.', 'Now has a 1 second cooldown, which triggers whenever switching forms.', "[U] The Morph status buff icon now shows the target hero's icon, instead of the Morph ability icon.", " Morph Replicate
Now toggles between the Morphed form and Morphling, instead of ending Morph prematurely.
Now has a 1 second cooldown, which triggers whenever switching forms.
[U] The Morph status buff icon now shows the target hero's icon, instead of the Morph ability icon."]

['Level 10 left talent changed: +20 movement speed -> +300  Waveform cast range/distance.', 'Level 25 right talent changed: +800  Waveform cast range/distance -> 2  Waveform charges', 'Increased minimum damage agility multiplier from 0.25 to 0.5.', 'Increased maximum damage agility multiplier from 0.5/1/1.5/2 to 1/1.5/2/2.5.', ' Adaptive Strike (Agility)\nIncreased minimum damage agility multiplier from 0.25 to 0.5.\nIncreased maximum damage agility multiplier from 0.5/1/1.5/2 to 1/1.5/2/2.5.', 'Increased  Adaptive Strike (Strength) minimum stun duration from 0.25 to 0.5.', 'Increased  Attribute Shift passive agility and strength bonus from 3/4/5/6 to 4/5/6/7.', 'Talents:']

['Reduced base  intelligence from 17 to 13.', 'Reduced movement speed from 285 to 280.', 'Increased base health regeneration from 0 to 1.5.', 'Increased base mana regeneration from 0.01 to 0.9.', " Aghanim's Scepter no longer grants Morphling the  Hybrid ability.", 'Split  Adaptive Strike up into two spells which level together,  Adaptive Strike (Agility) and  Adaptive Strike (Strength).
The agility version only deals damage, no stun or knockback. The strength version only stuns and knocks back, no damage.
When either is cast, the other one goes on a 3 second cooldown.
Cast range, cast time, mana cost and cooldown remain the same.', 'The agility version only deals damage, no stun or knockback. The strength version only stuns and knocks back, no damage.', 'When either is cast, the other one goes on a 3 second cooldown.', 'Cast range, cast time, mana cost and cooldown remain the same.', ' Adaptive Strike (Strength)
Neutral creeps targeted by  Adaptive Strike (Strength) now draw aggro and can be auto-attacked again.
